common.tenantNotFoundDesc: The tenant "{{slug}}" does not exist or has been deleted.

shared.confirmDeleteDesc: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.
shared.warningCannotUndo: Warning: This action cannot be undone!
shared.deleteWarningDesc: After deletion, all related data will be permanently lost and cannot be recovered.

hero.title: Chabod
hero.subtitle: A comprehensive management platform designed for modern churches, inheriting digital assets and simplifying administrative work.

features.title: Feature Overview
features.subtitle: Chabod provides comprehensive features that churches need, making management easier
features.memberManagementDesc: Manage church member information, everything is people-centered
features.groupManagementDesc: Customize church organization management, categorize ministries and church activities
features.eventManagementDesc: Internal event scheduling without conflicts, easier external promotion
features.resourceManagementDesc: Digital asset inheritance, simplified administrative work
features.serviceManagementDesc: Arrange service personnel to ensure smooth church operations
features.multiLanguageDesc: Supports Chinese interface, suitable for Chinese churches

values.title: Our Core Values
values.subtitle: The Chabod team is committed to developing digital tools that truly meet church needs
values.peopleCenteredDesc: Tools will not replace necessary interpersonal interactions
values.faithInheritanceDesc: The church has existed for two thousand years and will continue to exist. God will call the younger generation to love God and love the church
values.clickToLearnNaming: Click to learn about the naming origin
values.peopleCenteredList1: Churches can choose the features they need without affecting human ministry
values.peopleCenteredList2: Can be gradually implemented according to church pace
values.peopleCenteredList3: Reduce administrative burden, free up more time for caring for people
values.peopleCenteredList4: Strengthen rather than replace connections between people
values.faithInheritanceList1: New generations face busy and diverse information, need systematic digital assets
values.faithInheritanceList2: Simplify administrative work, making it easier for young generations to participate in ministry
values.faithInheritanceList3: Single entry point, gradually accumulate tools needed by the church
values.faithInheritanceList4: Open source community, allowing churches to participate together

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Flexible pricing plans to meet the needs of churches of different sizes

cta.title: Start Using Chabod for Church Management
cta.subtitle: Render unto Caesar what is Caesar's, and unto God what is God's. What can be digitized, leave it to Chabod

auth.welcome: Welcome to Chabod Church Management System
auth.agreeToTerms: I have read and agree to the above faith declaration and
auth.loggedOutSuccess: You have been successfully logged out.

auth.signInToChabod: Sign in to Chabod Church Management System
